mapper.insert: insert into tbl_recipeCuisine (bno, step, content) values (seq_recipeBoard.currval, #{step, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select tbl_recipecuisine.bno, tbl_recipeimage.ino, tbl_recipecuisine.step, tbl_recipecuisine.ccontent, tbl_recipeimage.thumbnail, tbl_recipeimage.image from tbl_recipecuisine join tbl_recipeimage on tbl_recipeimage.bno = tbl_recipecuisine.bno and tbl_recipeimage.step = tbl_recipecuisine.step order by bno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_recipeCuisine set step = #{step}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_recipeCuisine where bno = #{bno} and step = #{step}
